availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Tuttle (Lawyer, Capt. 3rd KY Vol. Inf. USA)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, lawyer. Kentucky native. Son of William and Sarah Tuttle. Married to Mollie (Mary) A. Tuttle. Father of William Tuttle, Phillip Tuttle, Mary Tuttle, Salla Tuttle, Kate Tuttle, Robert Tuttle, Nora Tuttle, Trigg Tuttle, Laura Tuttle, and Margaret Tuttle. Lawyer in Wayne County in 1860. Mustered into service as 1st Lieutenant of the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) on August 10, 1861. Promoted to Captain in May 1862.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District no. 1, p. 54. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, Monticello, p. 231. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, District no. 1, p. 21. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, Monticello, pg. 491. Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, Monticello, p. 5. Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 176. Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 614, 616. Pension Applications for Service in the US Army between 1861 and 1900, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Publication Number T289. Tuttle (1837-1927)," Memorial #31017821 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/31017821 (accessed August 15, 2018).
